events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported a refund request due to receiving the wrong item in their order.
Assigning the refund request to a customer service agent specialized in order issues.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the item I received which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund immediately, and you can keep the wrong item or return it at no cost.
I appreciate the quick resolution and the option to keep the item. Thank you for your help.
The refund has been processed and you should see the amount credited within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that your refund was received and that you are satisfied with the resolution.
Since everything is resolved, we are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime for further assistance.
We have sent you a brief satisfaction survey to hear about your experience with our support today.
